snippet: The Day: Republicans are pouncing on the White House for indulging in self-congratulations over Osama bin Laden's death. Republicans, of course, would never seek to capitalize on the worst day in New York history.
abstract: The Day: Republicans are pouncing on the White House for indulging in self-congratulations over Osama bin Laden's death. Republicans, of course, would never seek to capitalize on the worst day in New York history.
